title: Obari
author: Obari
created_time: October 25, 2022, 04:16:08 PMLast edit: November 01, 2022, 08:57:36 AM by Obari
content: It's really been a journey worth celebration.I've been so happy lately about the forum and my progress so far. It's been roughly a month I joined the forum and the growth has been an amazing one with the help of the forum members and the local board. After been introduced to the forum and consistent writing, I've really understood the fact that learning truly never ends.I never thought It would be any way this less difficult for me because I'm not the writing type I know it doesn't seem easy but one thing is sure, that nothing good comes easy as my journey has been so much amazing to me. A friend, introduced me to this forum and has proven his love to me beyond all doubts even without direct assistance on the forum but constantly reminding me why I joined and always show me a screenshot of the ranking system and what it take to attain a certain rank and the also the possibilities of earning while interacting with people and without him knowing, I've placed him in class of my destiny helpers, because I have stayed away from so much troubles and unnecessary expenses and debts as I'm always indoors trying to meet up my goals.I know my current level doesn't seem worths all this celebration to many, but to me it means alot to, as I'm not really a good writer, but I have been constantly reminded of the reward ahead and the only way to get it and that one of the best ways to stop bothering people is to write, which I try as much as possible to do even at midnights.God bless you my friend and if you get to see this post,please just know that, you own a special space in my heart forever.i want to announce my promotion toJR.MEMBER RANK as I also await my MEMBER RANKsoon.Please celebrate with me.Below is the link to my profile and to see my mehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3504269

comments.author: _morghulis
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on October 25, 2022, 04:16:08 PMi want to announce my promotion toJR.MEMBER RANK as I also await my MEMBER RANKsoon.Please celebrate with me.Below is the link to my profile and to see my mehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profileYou've been a Jr member for quite sometime now but it still a thing of joy seeing your rank increase. And by the way the link you provided isn't for your account maybe because you excluded your UID You can edit and add the correct link, here is it: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3504269~Valar~

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: _morghulis on October 25, 2022, 06:08:06 PMYou've been a Jr member for quite sometime now but it still a thing of joy seeing your rank increase. As can be seen on the activity calendar, th last activity window was on the 19th of this month, six days ago. Safe to say it's still very recent that OP ranked up.To the OP, congratulations on your new rank. Older and higher rank members often do not see the need to celebrate each rank increase, especially those which are much lower, but it's always positive seeing new members join the forum and learn from it.Good luck.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: _morghulis on October 25, 2022, 06:08:06 PMYou've been a Jr member for quite sometime now but it still a thing of joy seeing your rank increase. And by the way the link you provided isn't for your account maybe because you excluded your UID You can edit and add the correct link, here is it: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3504269~Valar~Thank you for the timely correction, It reflected my profile when I clicked on the link I submitted and it showed same thing as when clicked from yours, but i just copied and used the link you provided, maybe it might be different from other users as me.Thanks

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: First off I see it means a lot to you so congratulations but then I think consistency is what you should be focusing more on right now. It's a bit early to talk about your journey so far, it's not a rule not to but there are distractions and complacency it may bring in.You have moved up in rank that's good but see this as it's actually possible for you to rise and then set more targets and standards for your self, lay out plans to meet the goals, you see you do have a lot on your hand to feel relaxed. GOOD LUCK.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on October 25, 2022, 04:16:08 PMI never thought It would be any way this less difficult for me because I'm not the writing type I know it doesn't seem easy but one thing is sure, that nothing good comes easy as my journey has been so much amazing to me.Determination, at the end, is what sees us through during rough times. Ride on. I like the fact that you've conquered you writing lethargy. Keeping moving and don't relent. One day, you will get to the top. Remember, winners don't quit and quitters don't win.QuoteGod bless you my friend and if you get to see this post,please just know that, you own a special space in my heart forever.It's good you've acknowledged the source that brought you here, knowing also that they did you right by that act of kindness. Country hard nor be small. I want to believe you will keep the need to learn (beyond all other things) as your breastplate.Quotei want to announce my promotion toJr. Member Rank as I also await my Member Ranksoon.You're unofficially a Member ranked fellow. You already have more than enough merit (10 merit) for that. The only thing keeping you is your activity count. With a minimum of 60 activities you will move up to the Member rank.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: The road might not be so smooth as expected, continue reading and gradually learning the basics of the forum, community, and technical side of Bitcoin. Earning those merit's means you have shown effort but you still need to do more for your growth. Go to Meta and read those rules regularly, don't plagarised on the journey to full member as that will be yht the only hindrance to attain that rank. Help the community in your way up and report any uncallful acts to the moderators. Goodluck to you, you have come a long way, you still need to go a long way.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: When you see an original newbie who has no knowledge of the forum and has not been here before you will easily identify. I see the Joy and the determination of OP to succeed in the forum, keep it up.I will advise you to be steady and do more of reading and learning than more of writing. You will only write more if you don't understand what is happening here, but if you read and have good knowledge of cryptocurrency and what is happening here, you will not need to write much and you will not need to stress yourself. Don't stay indoors because of the forum, you can go out and try your hands in other things and visit the forum at your leisure. This is a discussion forum, not a university.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Double congratulations since you earned merits more than your rank. I admit earnings merits is pretty hard nowadays from the forum unless you struggle hard. However, you have to walk more way and for that, you need to contribute to the forum. As much you learn from here you can contribute. Follow other well-established users and read more. So you can be an established member as well.

comments.author: Russlenat
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on October 25, 2022, 06:19:50 PMQuote from: _morghulis on October 25, 2022, 06:08:06 PMYou've been a Jr member for quite sometime now but it still a thing of joy seeing your rank increase. As can be seen on the activity calendar, th last activity window was on the 19th of this month, six days ago. Safe to say it's still very recent that OP ranked up.To the OP, congratulations on your new rank. Older and higher rank members often do not see the need to celebrate each rank increase, especially those which are much lower, but it's always positive seeing new members join the forum and learn from it.Good luck. I’ve been there OP and I know the efforts you have to go through just to get that rank up or promotion. And certainly, everyone has gone through it. For now, continue acquiring news insights and information about crypto and the crypto market. That way, you will always have a good write ups that will also benefit other newbies  in the forum. Good luck on your crypto journey and I’ll aways hope for the best for you.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on October 25, 2022, 04:16:08 PM..After been introduced to the forum and consistent writing, I've really understood the fact that learning truly never ends.I never thought It would be any way this less difficult for me because I'm not the writing type I know it doesn't seem easy but one thing is sure, that nothing good comes easy as my journey has been so much amazing to me.This is sure, learning will never end and learning doesn't limit to the young, but fo everyone who wants to learn. Learning n the crypto world, for several people who are really new to this may be quite difficult because there are some new terms and information, So did I that time. But, this surely can be done and understood by everyone who is seriously trying and learning. Proof, many members are here from different backgrounds, both technology-related and not. Anyway, congratulations on your rank up, this is not the end of your journey and I am sure that you want the higher onesagain. This can be also one of the reminders for all here, especially forme to keep up the work and keep learning without any laziness (although sometimes, I feel little bit tired and lazy), but as long as we can still manage it, this seems to be normal

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: I can notice the excitement in your write-up. It is a nice attitude to want to celebrate every little win but you must also understand that there is a very long way ahead and with every new rank comes an increased responsibility which you must be prepared for. The intention of this is not to scare you but to make you prepared for better contribution. As a tip, increase your knowledge in cryptocurrency so you can contribute better to the subject of this forum.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Op i have peruse into your write up and i noticed that you are trying to elevate yourself, but what i you to comprehend is that the journey of this community can be actually be far for a newbie base on the newbies don't want to be concentrate or pay attention to observe exactly the methods of the senior colleagues, one thing about this community is proper observation and maintaining the protocol of the community.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: Opening a Btt account is easy, following it up is another thing. Not all members of the forum are ready to go on the process of earning merits first before they can rank up. So many have given up due to their inability to earn merits. A lot of consistency needs to push through before you master the act of posting in the forum. The journey doesn't seem easy at first.Bear in mind, that there is no rank that you can't attain to it in the forum if you mean to. I was once a beginner like you but here I am today as a full member. Believing to get to other ranks with time

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Always appreciate the friends who have introduced you to this forum. Believe me, without knowledge and guidance from him you would not be what you are today. Good friends will always have free time to teach you some things you don't understand about forums, he never tire of helping you even have to teach the same thing over and over again.Your journey in the forum is still very long, there are many things that you must learn here to continue the struggle to be better. Forum members really respect everyone, you can ask them if there's something you don't understand.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: This is not a correct way to announce your rank up, journey etc since it should be posted in this thread Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!.Although you're happy since you can rank up in this forum, but creating a thread like this one is useless since there's nothing should be discussed and everyone can rank up as long as they've earn both merit and activity for the requirement of the rank.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP you are repeating a topic that the forum tried to get rid of earlier. There is a dedicated thread where you can report your progress. Just read all the reasons for creating such a topic, and I really hope that you understand everything correctly.I think you will be disappointed to know that many similar threads that have been created before have been called merit hunts. Are you ready to accept the same assessment?Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: Amazing trip. If you are able to survive until you reach Rank Jr. Member, you will certainly have seriousness in developing your account. You are lucky to be introduced to this forum by your friends and it is certainly the right way for you to grow. in just 2 months you are able to rank up to Jr. Member is already extraordinary, it takes effort and strong determination to be consistent. You still have a long way to go and of course this will be a good start. Congratulations on your rank increase.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: Congratulations bro, you have reached a higher level. This will be a new journey for you.Getting to know the Bitcointalk Forum gives you many benefits, especially a lot of knowledge that you can learn from this forum. If you are really determined to stay active and continue to be productive in this forum, of course you will deserve to go to the next level. Jr.Member rank becomes the initial level you get, there are still Rank Member, Full Member, Sr. Member, Hero Member and Legendary you need to pass. It's a long journey, but it won't be felt if you're really active.Make some useful posts and of course do it consistently, don't be a spammer in this forum, because spammers will not be needed. Congratulations again on your promotion to Jr. member, good job bro.Quote from: theymos on January 24, 2018, 11:00:11 PMIn addition to activity, everyone now has a merit score, and you need both a certain activity level and a certain merit score in order to reach higher member ranks. The required scores are:RankRequired activityRequired meritBrand new00Newbie10Jr Member301Member6010Full Member120100Sr. Member240250Hero Member480500LegendaryRandom in the range 775-10301000

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Thank you all for your for your kind words and love towards me, @Apocollapse @lovesmayfamilis for the timely intervention and correction, I've made a new post in the right thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.msg61186570#msg61186570And this thread will be locked now.Below is the link to my appreciation and rank up post https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.msg61186570#msg61186570
